components.name: eucanetd
components.description: Used to track component level items associated with Edge.

fields.description:
In 4.1.0 with VPC setup eucanetd will not complain if nginx is not installed on CLC (nginx is needed for meta-data proxy on CLC in VPC).

Following is eucanetd.log during the time when the nginx stuff gets executed (note the nginx package was not installed on the machine during this time):

{code}
2015-01-12 01:11:52 DEBUG 000032437 do_midonet_update        | TOTAL SECGROUPS: 1
2015-01-12 01:11:52 DEBUG 000032437 do_midonet_update        | CHECK: sg-f9362c4c/1
2015-01-12 01:11:52 DEBUG 000032437 do_midonet_update        | TOTAL VPCS: 1
2015-01-12 01:11:52 DEBUG 000032437 do_midonet_update        | CHECK: vpc-86f5ccad/1
2015-01-12 01:11:52 DEBUG 000032437 do_midonet_update        | 	CHECK: subnet-8ef0a118/1
2015-01-12 01:11:52 DEBUG 000032437 do_midonet_update        | 		CHECK: i-06f39f90/1
2015-01-12 01:11:52 DEBUG 000032437 do_metaproxy_maintain    | core proxy not running, starting new core proxy
2015-01-12 01:11:52 DEBUG 000032437 do_metaproxy_maintain    | VPC (vpc-86f5ccad) proxy not running, starting new proxy
2015-01-12 01:11:52 DEBUG 000032437 se_print                 | COMMAND SEQUENCE PRINT: idx='0' command='//usr/lib/eucalyptus/euca_rootwrap nginx -p . -c //usr/share/eucalyptus/nginx_proxy.conf -g 'pid //var/run/eucalyptus/nginx_localproxy.pid; env NEXTHOP=127.0.0.1; env NEXTHOPPORT=8773; env EUCAHOME=/;'' cleanup_command='(null)'
2015-01-12 01:11:52 DEBUG 000032437 se_print                 | COMMAND SEQUENCE PRINT: idx='1' command='//usr/lib/eucalyptus/euca_rootwrap ip netns exec vpc-86f5ccad nginx -p . -c //usr/share/eucalyptus/nginx_proxy.conf -g 'pid //var/run/eucalyptus/nginx_vpcproxy_vpc-86f5ccad.pid; env VPCID=vpc-86f5ccad; env NEXTHOP=169.254.0.1; env NEXTHOPPORT=31338; env EUCAHOME=/;'' cleanup_command='(null)'
2015-01-12 01:11:52 DEBUG 000032437 se_execute               | RUNNING COMMAND: command='//usr/lib/eucalyptus/euca_rootwrap nginx -p . -c //usr/share/eucalyptus/nginx_proxy.conf -g 'pid //var/run/eucalyptus/nginx_localproxy.pid; env NEXTHOP=127.0.0.1; env NEXTHOPPORT=8773; env EUCAHOME=/;''
2015-01-12 01:11:52 DEBUG 000032437 se_execute               | COMMAND SUCCESS: command='//usr/lib/eucalyptus/euca_rootwrap nginx -p . -c //usr/share/eucalyptus/nginx_proxy.conf -g 'pid //var/run/eucalyptus/nginx_localproxy.pid; env NEXTHOP=127.0.0.1; env NEXTHOPPORT=8773; env EUCAHOME=/;'' stdout='' stderr=''
2015-01-12 01:11:52 DEBUG 000032437 se_execute               | RUNNING COMMAND: command='//usr/lib/eucalyptus/euca_rootwrap ip netns exec vpc-86f5ccad nginx -p . -c //usr/share/eucalyptus/nginx_proxy.conf -g 'pid //var/run/eucalyptus/nginx_vpcproxy_vpc-86f5ccad.pid; env VPCID=vpc-86f5ccad; env NEXTHOP=169.254.0.1; env NEXTHOPPORT=31338; env EUCAHOME=/;''
2015-01-12 01:11:52 DEBUG 000032437 se_execute               | COMMAND SUCCESS: command='//usr/lib/eucalyptus/euca_rootwrap ip netns exec vpc-86f5ccad nginx -p . -c //usr/share/eucalyptus/nginx_proxy.conf -g 'pid //var/run/eucalyptus/nginx_vpcproxy_vpc-86f5ccad.pid; env VPCID=vpc-86f5ccad; env NEXTHOP=169.254.0.1; env NEXTHOPPORT=31338; env EUCAHOME=/;'' stdout='' stderr=''
2015-01-12 01:11:52  INFO 000032437 main                     | new Eucalyptus/Midonet networking state sync: updated successfully
2015-01-12 01:11:52 DEBUG 000032437 main                     | main loop complete: sleeping 5 seconds before next poll
{code}

Ideally one would expect eucanetd to log an error message because no nginx was available on the system but here no ERROR is logged instead eucanetd continues to retry and run the core proxy again after some time.

{code}
# cat /var/log/eucalyptus/eucanetd.log  | grep "core proxy not running, starting new core proxy"
2015-01-11 22:57:30 DEBUG 000030521 do_metaproxy_maintain    | core proxy not running, starting new core proxy
2015-01-11 23:14:42 DEBUG 000030521 do_metaproxy_maintain    | core proxy not running, starting new core proxy
2015-01-11 23:16:03 DEBUG 000030521 do_metaproxy_maintain    | core proxy not running, starting new core proxy
2015-01-12 00:29:57 DEBUG 000030521 do_metaproxy_maintain    | core proxy not running, starting new core proxy
2015-01-12 00:30:34 DEBUG 000030521 do_metaproxy_maintain    | core proxy not running, starting new core proxy
2015-01-12 00:32:16 DEBUG 000030521 do_metaproxy_maintain    | core proxy not running, starting new core proxy
2015-01-12 00:41:02 DEBUG 000030521 do_metaproxy_maintain    | core proxy not running, starting new core proxy
2015-01-12 00:53:03 DEBUG 000030521 do_metaproxy_maintain    | core proxy not running, starting new core proxy
2015-01-12 01:04:26 DEBUG 000031970 do_metaproxy_maintain    | core proxy not running, starting new core proxy
2015-01-12 01:04:59 DEBUG 000032437 do_metaproxy_maintain    | core proxy not running, starting new core proxy
2015-01-12 01:05:51 DEBUG 000031970 do_metaproxy_maintain    | core proxy not running, starting new core proxy
2015-01-12 01:05:53 DEBUG 000030521 do_metaproxy_maintain    | core proxy not running, starting new core proxy
2015-01-12 01:05:54 DEBUG 000032437 do_metaproxy_maintain    | core proxy not running, starting new core proxy
2015-01-12 01:06:21 DEBUG 000031970 do_metaproxy_maintain    | core proxy not running, starting new core proxy
2015-01-12 01:06:23 DEBUG 000030521 do_metaproxy_maintain    | core proxy not running, starting new core proxy
2015-01-12 01:06:24 DEBUG 000032437 do_metaproxy_maintain    | core proxy not running, starting new core proxy
2015-01-12 01:07:07 DEBUG 000031970 do_metaproxy_maintain    | core proxy not running, starting new core proxy
2015-01-12 01:07:09 DEBUG 000030521 do_metaproxy_maintain    | core proxy not running, starting new core proxy
2015-01-12 01:07:10 DEBUG 000032437 do_metaproxy_maintain    | core proxy not running, starting new core proxy
2015-01-12 01:07:24 DEBUG 000031970 do_metaproxy_maintain    | core proxy not running, starting new core proxy
2015-01-12 01:07:25 DEBUG 000030521 do_metaproxy_maintain    | core proxy not running, starting new core proxy
2015-01-12 01:07:25 DEBUG 000032437 do_metaproxy_maintain    | core proxy not running, starting new core proxy
2015-01-12 01:11:05 DEBUG 000031970 do_metaproxy_maintain    | core proxy not running, starting new core proxy
2015-01-12 01:11:06 DEBUG 000030521 do_metaproxy_maintain    | core proxy not running, starting new core proxy
2015-01-12 01:11:07 DEBUG 000032437 do_metaproxy_maintain    | core proxy not running, starting new core proxy
2015-01-12 01:11:51 DEBUG 000031970 do_metaproxy_maintain    | core proxy not running, starting new core proxy
2015-01-12 01:11:52 DEBUG 000030521 do_metaproxy_maintain    | core proxy not running, starting new core proxy
2015-01-12 01:11:52 DEBUG 000032437 do_metaproxy_maintain    | core proxy not running, starting new core proxy
2015-01-12 01:28:23 DEBUG 000031970 do_metaproxy_maintain    | core proxy not running, starting new core proxy
{code}
fields.summary: eucanetd does not error out if nginx is not installed

comments.body: Why is eucalyptus using nginx for this purpose when it could just as easily use httpd and not depend on yet another web server?
